title: Audit Dashboard
seeHow: See how you’ve been doing, and what
weTookALook: We took a look at your current marketing strategy, and here’s what we found!

paying.title: How much are you paying?
paying.weCanLowerYourCost: We can lower your cost per click by raising your ad quality score.

revenue.title: Where does your revenue come from?

improve.title: What can we improve?
improve.increaseAudienceDescr: In order for social media marketing to work, you need an audience. Otherwise it’s like talking to a brick wall. By increasing your reach, we can increase your revenue.
improve.increaseCustomerDescr: Customer lifetime value (CLV) is one of the key stats to track as part of a customer experience program. CLV is a measurement of how valuable a customer is to your company, not just on a purchase-by-purchase basis but across the whole relationship.
improve.decreaseMarketingDescr: You’re spending a lot money on your marketing right now. We can more efficiently manage your spend, which results in a higher margin.
